solution_line_template: If {num_friends} friends each want {bars_per_friend} bars, that's {num_friends} friends * {bars_per_friend} bars = <<{num_friends}*{bars_per_friend}={total_bars_needed}>>{total_bars_needed} bars needed.
Each box contains {bars_per_box} bars, so {total_bars_needed} bars / {bars_per_box} bars per box = <<{total_bars_needed}/{bars_per_box}={total_boxes_needed}>>{total_boxes_needed} boxes needed.
There are {num_friends} friends so ${total_cost} / {num_friends} friends = $<<{total_cost}/{num_friends}={cost_per_person}>>{cost_per_person} per person.
